Sql.query: select prfrelcodi, ptomedicodi, areacodi, ptomedicodicalc, prfrelfactor, prfrelusucreacion, prfrelfeccreacion, prfrelusumodificacion, prfrelfecmodificacion from prn_formularel where ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi and ptomedicodicalc = :ptomedicodicalc

insert into prn_formularel( prfrelcodi, ptomedicodi, areacodi, ptomedicodicalc, prfrelfactor, prfrelusucreacion, prfrelfeccreacion, prfrelusumodificacion, prfrelfecmodificacion ) values( :prfrelcodi, :ptomedicodi, :areacodi, :ptomedicodicalc, :prfrelfactor, :prfrelusucreacion, :prfrelfeccreacion, :prfrelusumodificacion, :prfrelfecmodificacion )

update prn_formularel set prfrelfactor = :prfrelfactor, prfrelusumodificacion = :prfrelusumodificacion, prfrelfecmodificacion = :prfrelfecmodificacion where ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi and ptomedicodicalc = :ptomedicodicalc
delete from prn_formularel where ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi and ptomedicodicalc = :ptomedicodicalc
select prfrelcodi, ptomedicodi, areacodi, ptomedicodicalc, prfrelfactor, prfrelusucreacion, prfrelfeccreacion, prfrelusumodificacion, prfrelfecmodificacion from prn_formularel
select prrucodi as ptomedicodicalc, prruabrev as ptomedidesc from me_perfil_rule where prruactiva = 'S' and prrulastuser in ({0}) order by prrucodi

select fr.ptomedicodicalc, mpr.prruabrev as ptomedidesc, fr.prfrelfactor from prn_formularel fr join me_perfil_rule mpr on fr.ptomedicodicalc = mpr.prrucodi where mpr.prruactiva = 'S' and fr.ptomedicodi = {0} and mpr.prrulastuser in ({1}) order by fr.ptomedicodicalc
select ptomedicodi as ptomedicodicalc, ptomedidesc from me_ptomedicion where ptomedicalculado = 'S' and origlectcodi = 16 order by ptomedicodicalc

select fr.ptomedicodicalc, pt.ptomedidesc, fr.prfrelfactor from prn_formularel fr join me_ptomedicion pt on fr.ptomedicodicalc = pt.ptomedicodi where fr.ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi order by fr.ptomedicodicalc
